Can the ALP-MOF-1-A adsorb water from air?
data.answer: Yes, ALP-MOF-2-A readily adsorbs water from air, indicating strong water binding.

data.question: Is the Co(II) in ALP-MOF-2 predicted to have a stronger interaction with water molecules compared to Zn(II) in ALP-MOF-1?
data.answer: Yes, Co(II) is predicted to have a stronger interaction with water than Zn(II).

data.question: Does the water adsorption capacity of ALP-MOF-2-A decrease after a second water adsorption experiment?
data.answer: Yes, the water adsorption capacity of ALP-MOF-2-A decreases after a second water adsorption experiment.
